jetpack-related-posts.title: Pricing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 1 Reef Snorkeling Rental Gear Included $30 Everyone is Welcome Snorkeling guided By PADI PRO Approx 1.5hr Drinking water on-board Book Now 2 Reef Snorkeling Rental Gear Included $45 Everyone is Welcome Snorkeling guided by PADI PRO Approx 3hr Snacks and Soft drinks on-board Book Now Discover Scuba Diving (Max…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Try Scuba
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: PADI DISCOVER SCUBA DIVING Our Discover Scuba Diving course is the perfect introduction to the underwater world!!! First we go to the pool for some basic diving skills, and then we head out to the ocean for a dive on one of our gorgeous reefs.A PADI instructor will be right…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Home –
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Scuba Diving & Snorkeling Come and join the excitement with our diving team! Tripadvisor 5X HALL OF FAME WINNER WHY DIVE WITH US? Every day we schedule 2 morning boat dives (at 9.00 and 11.00), 2 in the afternoon (at 1.00 and 2.30), and night dives, when requested. We ask…
